properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 2 at 8:48AM PST until January 3 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 kt increasing to 25 to 35 kt in the
afternoon and evening on Fri. Seas W 14 ft at 17 seconds today,
SW 15 ft at 14 seconds on Fri, W 15 ft at 13 seconds on Sat and
NW 13 ft at 14 seconds on Sun.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 1 PM PST Friday.
For the Gale Watch, from Friday afternoon through Friday
evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST FRIDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING
